short_summary: Fluke 6532-70M E DWT Electronic Deadweight Tester
description: The Department of Defence Research and Development requires one Fluke 6532-70M E DWT Electronic Deadweight Tester. The requested delivery date is March 15 2024. Suppliers must be pre-qualified under the Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC series to participate.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
full_summary:
**Electronic Deadweight Tester Tender**

# Tender Details

* Reference Number: cb-6746-38264874
* Solicitation Number: 2022-12275
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: June 29, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: July 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 31, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: November 3, 2023
* Government of Canada Reference Number: None

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Government Defences (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Preference: None

## Trade Agreements

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

## Deliveries

* Regions of Opportunity: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

## Contact Information

* Name: Marie-Claude Rose
* Email: [marie-claude.rose@forces.gc.ca](mailto:marie-claude.rose@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (418) 929-0479
* Fax: None

## Tender Documents

* Tender Notice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6746/2022-12275-rfq_0.pdf (English)
* Tender Notice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6746/2022-12275-ddp.pdf (French)

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence – Defence Research and Development Canada is seeking to procure one Electronic Deadweight Tester, Fluke 6532-70M E DWT, for a period of three months. The requested delivery date is March 15, 2024. The tender is open to pre-
